title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size through the UI.
EB: The label height should be updated to accommodate the new font size after modifying it through the UI.
SR: 1. Add a label. 2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
